front.title: Securing MIPv6 BUs using return routability (BU3WAY)

abstract.t: This document is intended to serve as input to the discussion in theMobile IP Working Group regarding securing MIPv6 Binding Updates.This document tries to capture a possible extreme point in the designspace for a solution to that problem, for the purposes of exploringthe design space. The author does not claim that this protocol isbetter than any other proposed solutions - merely that it isdifferent and the differences can help in understanding designtradeoffs in this space.
